item.title: Michael Folkson - Taproot update (2022-03-03)
item.description: Name: Michael Folkson Topic: State of the Taproot Address 2022 Location: Advancing Bitcoin Date: March 3rd 2022 Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8RNYhwEQKxM Slides: https://www.dropbox.com/s/l31cy3xkw0zi6aq/Advancing%20Bitcoin%20presentation%20-%20Michael%20Folkson.pdf?dl=0 Intro Ok, so good morning. So earlier this week there was the State of the Union Address so I thought I’d make a bad joke first up. This talk is going to be the “State of the Taproot Address”. I promise all the bad jokes that I make in this presentation will all be Drake gifs, there will be no other jokes involved.
